title: Zero to One
subtitle: Peter Thiel
content: Zero to One: Notes on Startups, or How to Build the Future is a book by Peter Thiel, published in 2014. Thiel, co-founder of PayPal and Palantir, shares his insights on entrepreneurship and innovation, emphasizing the importance of creating unique and valuable businesses that go from zero to monopoly. He challenges conventional wisdom and encourages entrepreneurs to pursue ambitious goals, disrupt existing industries, and create a better future through technology and innovation.
